Region constructor

Region({@required String identifier, String proximityUUID, int major, int minor })

Constructor for creating Region object.

The proximityUUID must not be null when Platform.isIOS

Implementation 

Region(
    {@required this.identifier,
      this.proximityUUID,
      this.major,
      this.minor}) {
  if (Platform.isIOS) {
    assert(proximityUUID != null);
  }
}
